name: doxygen2typescript
description: Generates TypeScript type declarations from doxygen xml output particularly to genereate opencv.js types

scripts.test: npm run build && npx ava --serial --concurrency 1 --config ava.config.js
scripts.test-js: echo 0; npm run build && npx ava --serial --concurrency 1 --config ava.config-js.js
scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.run: npm run build && rm -rf tmp && node --max-old-space-size=5000  dist/src/test.js
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run build && npm test && npm run test-js

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
